This Women's Day, Avivo Group launched Woman 34 Clinic, the first initiative in the country aimed at raising awareness around 34 menopausal symptoms!
Surprisingly, of these 34, only 3-4 symptoms are generally spoken about and are addressed amongst women.
But thanks to AVIVO group, this comprehensive campaign addresses this problem via state-of-the-art screenings, medical therapies as well as one-on-one counselling.
Women 34 clinic was launched at PrimaCare Dubai, Reem Medical Group Sharjah and National Hospital Abu Dhabi with free Gynaecology consultations and tailor-made packages for women in their 40s.
